testcase.classname: As a user I want to calculate how much money I can save in a registered retirement savings
testcase.name: User should be able to see an error message if monthly rent is not provided - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given User launches the application.........................................passed And User should be at the homepage..........................................passed And User accepts the privacy settings.......................................passed And User sees the Mortgages tab.............................................passed And User hovers over Mortgages tab..........................................passed And User clicks Rent vs Buy Calculator......................................passed And User should be at the Rent vs Buy Calculator page.......................passed And User should see the calculator fields...................................passed When User inputs monthly rent "0"...........................................passed Then User shouldn't be able to click on the calculate button and it should be disabled.passed Then User should see an error message "Please enter your monthly rent.".....passed
